attributes.action: Close schools for a week or two after Christmas to stop risk of any infections
attributes.background: Keep schools, collages, university closed after the less strict rules after Christmas to stop any possible risk of infections if people have mixed with people during Christmas time!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

All nurseries and places of education to stay closed after Xmas to 15 January
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561988

Close schools, Colleges and Universities starting 12 December for 6 weeks
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562087
